name: Monkey Shine
prerequisiteFormula: @wis_score >= 13 AND @feat:improved_unarmed_strike AND @feat:monkey_moves AND @feat:monkey_style AND @ability:stunning_fist#unchained_monk AND @skill:acrobatics >= 11 AND @skill:climb >= 11
descriptionText: You combine acrobatics and opportunity to devastating effect against your opponent.
